title: Machine Learning Engineer
description: Build and deploy ML models using Python, TensorFlow, PyTorch, NLP, and deep learning techniques.

title: Data Scientist
description: Work with structured/unstructured data using Python, Pandas, NumPy, machine learning, and statistics.

title: Data Analyst
description: Analyze data using SQL, Excel, Power BI, and visualization tools to generate business insights.

title: AI Engineer
description: Design AI solutions using NLP, computer vision, Hugging Face models, LangChain, and deep learning frameworks.

title: Backend Developer (Python)
description: Build REST APIs using FastAPI or Django with database integration and Docker containerization.

title: NLP Engineer
description: Work on NLP pipelines using NLTK, spaCy, transformers, and large language models.

title: MLOps Engineer
description: Manage ML pipelines, model deployment, versioning using MLflow, Docker, AWS, and CI/CD.

title: Big Data Engineer
description: Work with large-scale data using Spark, Hadoop, SQL, and data pipelines.

title: Python Developer
description: Develop scalable applications using Python, Flask/FastAPI, and database integrations.

title: Frontend Developer
description: Build user interfaces using React, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and modern UI frameworks.

title: Cloud Engineer
description: Manage cloud infrastructure using AWS services like EC2, S3, IAM, and deployment pipelines.

title: AI Product Engineer
description: Build end-to-end AI products using LLMs, Hugging Face, LangChain, vector databases, and FastAPI.

title: Business Intelligence (BI) Developer
description: Create dashboards using Power BI, Tableau, SQL, and data visualization.

title: Deep Learning Engineer
description: Design neural networks using TensorFlow, PyTorch, CNNs, RNNs, and transformers.

title: Full Stack Developer
description: Build full-stack web apps using React, FastAPI/Node.js, databases, and Docker.
